commits.message:
EUCA-12430 - failed to store all sensor data due to lack of space

Problem Description: When you run MAX_INSTANCES_PER_CC the sensor cache should fill up, with a minimum
                     setting of 16 and running 16 instances the 16th instance would fail to get a slot
                     in the sensor resource cache.
Solution Description: Call init_state with the correct number of resources needed.

Changes: modify init_state() call to remove off by one error

Testing:
 - Tested out 16 MAX_INSTANCES_PER_CC and running 16 instances, verified by instrumenting the sensor cache
   that all slots were now being used correctly.
 - Error message no longer appears in the logs.
